activities: Users create accounts by providing name and email address. The account allows them to securely request genetic test related processes, including: requesting a genetic screen from us, to  receive authorization from their medical professional,  provide payment via insurance or credit card and schedule appointments with medical professionals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data, including manually processed data.
recoursemech: Counsyl has chosen the EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) to serve as an independent recourse mechanism (IRM) for dispute resolution arising from collection, use, and retention of personal information transferred from EU member countries and has remitted a fee to the United States Council for International Business, acting as a trusted third party on behalf of the European Union (EU) Data Protection Authorities
